name: FLORA GUARD 2 Pack Door Stopper - Premium Zinc and Rubber Wedge Non-Scratching Heavy Duty Door Stop for All Floor Types, Non-Slip Design
short_description: Heavy-Duty Construction: Made from premium zinc alloy and durable rubber, our door stoppers are designed to withstand heavy use, ensuring long-lasting performance
Non-Slip Grip: The soft rubber bottom provides excellent traction on all floor types, including carpet, tile, and parquet, preventing unwanted door movement
Versatile Use: The door wedge is perfect for heavy-duty doors, metal doors, and security doors in residential and commercial settings, effectively preventing doors from blowing shut
Eye-Catching Design: Featuring a beautiful shimmering silver finish, these door stoppers for bottom of door not only provide functionality but also add a touch of elegance to your space
Easy to Use: No installation needed, just place it down and use. Compact and lightweight for convenient everyday use
product_description: Upgrade your door security with our 2 Pack Heavy Duty Door Stoppers, expertly crafted from premium zinc alloy and durable rubber. Designed to suit any door and floor type, these non-scratching door stoppers feature a waterproof and rustproof finish with a stunning shimmering silver appearance. The non-slip design ensures a firm grip on carpets, parquet, and tile floors, preventing heavy doors from slamming shut due to drafts. Ideal for heavy-duty applications in homes, businesses, schools, and warehouses, these door stoppers block every type of door securely.

Anti slip design simple shape,four colors options.Place the rubber door stop horizontally at the bottom of the door, keeping it in the same plane as the door, so that it does not protrude vertically outside the door and obstruct passage.

Superior Grip and Safety: 3D textured surface and anti-slip base ensure a firm hold on floors (tile, wood, marble, etc.), preventing doors from slamming shut or sliding unexpectedly. The door wedge bottom door block works well on different floor surfaces, suitable for All Floor Types : wooden floors, tiles, carpets, concrete floors, etc., with anti-collision and anti-slip design.
